DOC.brief_summary: Pre-made rapid prototyping models will be used to increase patient education versus current methodologies.
DOC.brief_title: Rapid Prototyping Models for Patient Education
DOC.detailed_description: Post-partum women and their co-parent will have a medical condition explained to them first verbally, followed by a questionnaire, and then with the use of anatomical models created by rapid prototyping, followed by a questionnaire. The two questionnaires will then be compared.
DOC.criteria: Mother Postpartum Atraumatic delivery of healthy, live infant at HMC Age > 18 Coparent Coparent Atraumatic delivery of healthy, live infant at HMC Age > 18 any pregnancy related issues fetal loss NICU stay > 6 hours Emergent cesarean section Postpartum hemorrhage Hysterectomy Any other condition requiring unplanned, medical intervention during labor and delivery Prior fetal loss or anomaly Inability to read or write English those who do not consent
